[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” custom_css_main_element=”max-width:850px;”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0px||40px|” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″]

Market Leader is the Clear Choice for a Complete Solution

A proud customer of Market Leader for over 10 years, Broker/Owner Greg Traynor of Wyndham-Lyons Realty Services believes in providing agents with powerful tools to serve their clients from start to finish. With Market Leader Business Suite, agents can nurture clients from the beginning of their search through closing with an IDX website, real-time listing alerts, and neighborhood and market reports. Post-closing, agents can take advantage of marketing automation tools to stay engaged year-round. Greg and his agents recommend utilizing the immense amount of training offered through the Million Dollar Pipeline Program. Greg recommends Market Leader Business Suite, “if you are looking for a complete solution, from start to finish for your client experience, Market Leader is the clear choice.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#f4f4f4″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ max_width=”900px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center”]

Explore the products that are helping Gregory grow his business:
